title: Imprint
author: Christopher West
summary: "Imprint" is a delightful variation of the classic Snake game, featuring a devoted momma duck leading her adorable ducklings through a picturesque park in search of delicious bread crumbs. In this heartwarming adventure, players take on the role of the caring momma duck as she guides her ducklings through the lush park landscape.

title: Pond Invaders
author: Jaaron Williams Gunpot
summary: Dive into a quackingly fun adventure with 'Pond Invaders,' a delightful twist on the classic arcade game 'Space Invaders' that's drenched in duck-themed charm! In this whimsical adaptation, players find themselves defending a tranquil pond from an invasion of mischievous ducks descending from the skies above.

title: Quack Attack
author: Joseph Bean and Zoe Bingham
summary: Prepare for a quacktastic twist on the beloved tower defense genre with 'Quack Attack' where cunning ducks take center stage in a frantic battle to safeguard their precious nest at the river's end! Set in a lush and vibrant riverside habitat, players must strategize and deploy their feathered forces to thwart waves of oncoming obstacles threatening their peaceful sanctuary
